name: Bugs Unisex Sleeveless
description:
A classic scooped neck unisex sleeveless t-shirt by Ether. Charcoal grey, the 12 limited edition sleeveless t-shirts feature a compelling, seductive graphic hand finished print depicting the shared fragility of existence, edition number and a logo to the front hem, combine to form the brand’s much loved signature style.

From a new breed of super soft garments, Ethers 100% 115g Combined Fine Cotton Jersey sleeveless t-shirt has a controlled nano-fibril structure, ensuring a perfect and lasting fit. This unique and innovating material moves moisture away from the body, keeping you cool when temperatures are hot and warm when cold.

Devoted to the pursuit of the finest commercial quality Ether hand finish and execute each limited edition print in discharge inks, creating different natural highs and lows across the garment, making each numbered sleeveless t-shirt unique from the first to the last.

Deliveries will be made within 2-4 working days after placing your order. Please note that working days do not include Weekends or Bank Holidays.

name: In Search Of Lost Time Sweater
description:
A boyfriend cut, scoop crew neck sweater by Ether. Featuring a compelling, seductive raised flock graphic and logo to the left cuff, combine to form the brand’s much loved signature style.

Devoted to the pursuit of the finest commercial quality Ether pair the sharp clean lines of the design with the soft, luxurious feel of the flock.

From a new breed of super soft garments, Ethers 100% Brushed Organic Cotton sweater has a controlled nano-fibril structure. This unique, Climate Neutral® and innovating material is soft to the touch, keeping you cool when temperatures are hot and warm when cold.

Deliveries will be made within 2-4 working days after placing your order. Please note that working days do not include Weekends or Bank Holidays.

£5 from every 'In Search Of Lost Time' Sweater sold will go to Pancreatic Cancer UK http://www.justgiving.com/ether

name: Fools Gold
description:
A low cut tunic vest by Ether. Featuring a compelling, seductive dye detail and extravagant gold design. A contrasting, spine detail to the reverse and a logo to the front hem, combine to form the brand’s much loved signature style.

Devoted to the pursuit of the finest commercial quality Ether execute each garment in discharge inks, creating different natural highs and lows across the garment, making each vest unique from the first to the last.

From a new breed of super soft garments, Ethers 100% Viscose garment has a controlled nano-fibril structure. This unique and innovating material moves moisture away from the body, keeping you cool when temperatures are hot and warm when cold.

Deliveries will be made within 2-4 working days after placing your order. Please note that working days do not include Weekends or Bank Holidays.

name: The End Sweater
description:
A crew neck sweater by Ether. Featuring a compelling, seductive graphic print depicting the inevitable and ever ensuing persistence of time. A 360 degree design, with print detail and a logo to the left cuff, combine to form the brand’s much loved signature style.

Devoted to the pursuit of the finest commercial quality Ether pair the sharp clean lines of the design with the soft, luxurious feel of the garment.

From a new breed of super soft garments, Ethers 100% Brushed Organic Cotton sweater has a controlled nano-fibril structure. This unique, Climate Neutral® and innovating material is soft to the touch, keeping you cool when temperatures are hot and warm when cold.

Deliveries will be made within 2-4 working days after placing your order. Please note that working days do not include Weekends or Bank Holidays.

name: The Origin T-shirt
description:
A classic short sleeve scooped neck t-shirt by Ether. Charcoal grey, the t-shirt features the iconic Ether purgatory embroidered logo. Inspired from a viking rune, the lines signifying heaven at the top, the lower line hell and the crossed lines center purgatory. The complimenting, black chest detail logo and charcoal grey t-shirt combine to form the brand’s much loved signature style....

From a new breed of super soft garments, Ethers 100% 115g Combined Fine Cotton Jersey t-shirt has a controlled nano-fibril structure, ensuring a perfect and lasting fit. This unique and innovating material moves moisture away from the body, keeping you cool when temperatures are hot and warm when cold.

Deliveries will be made within 2-4 working days after placing your order. Please note that working days do not include Weekends or Bank Holidays.

name: Nostalgic Romanticises Womens Vest
description:
A low cut racerback tunic vest by Ether. Featuring a compelling, seductive dye detail. A contrasting, spine detail to the reverse and a logo to the front hem, combine to form the brand’s much loved signature style.

Devoted to the pursuit of the finest commercial quality Ether execute each garment in discharge inks, creating different natural highs and lows across the garment, making each vest unique from the first to the last.

From a new breed of super soft garments, Ethers 100% Tencel Lyocell garment has a controlled nano-fibril structure. This unique and innovating material moves moisture away from the body, keeping you cool when temperatures are hot and warm when cold.

Deliveries will be made within 2-4 working days after placing your order. Please note that working days do not include Weekends or Bank Holidays.

name: Oxblood Earrings
description:
A pair of handmade, oxblood glass pearl earrings, on hallmarked sterling silver wire by Ether. The oxblood pearls, bathed in molten magma undertones, dive into the darkness of lust and desire. Fiercely complimented by the pure, silver wire, whose arching curves, cut sleek sharp lines of elegance, the two combine to form the brand’s much loved signature style.

Devoted to the pursuit of the finest commercial quality, each piece is individually crafted by hand, making each pair of earrings unique from the first to the last.

In the interest of hygiene we are unable to exchange or refund any pierced jewellery. Deliveries will be made within 2-4 working days after placing your order. Please note that working days do not include Weekends or Bank Holidays.

name: Peacock Pearl Earrings
description:
A pair of handmade, freshwater peacock pearl earrings, on hallmarked sterling silver wire by Ether. The freshwater pearls, bathed in seductive peacock undertones, dive into the darkness of lust and desire. Fiercely complimented by the pure, silver wire, whose arching curves, cut sleek sharp lines of elegance, the two combine to form the brand’s much loved signature style.
